title: Magic Face T2-Iron-Interactive
summary: Interactive watch face with changeable background, markers and indicators!
description: Features-8 unique background images-9 marker styles-8 function indicators: Compass, steps, week , seconds, moon phase, weather, phone battery, watch battery.- Centigrade or Fahrenheit-Step goals from 1,000 to 20,000This watch face has interactive functions, select two features (Step & Weather)as indicators on your phone side first, and tap each separately on your watch.Interactive function-Steps1:New clear, uncluttered designed personal step-info center.2:Weekly step curve tell how much you have done in past 6 days with current step and distance info .3:Curve color could be changed daily from low red to high green which depends on if your actual steps reach to the goal or not. 4:Swipe down the page to check your whole activity history.Interactive function-Weather1:Current Weather info page with details of coming days2:Swipe down the page to get Weather forecast for 16 days !More FacesIf you like this interactive Face T2-Iron, share it with your friends.Feel free to try our new watch face platform Magic Watchface, all the winners’ original watch faces will be here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.magicwatchface.platformYou can also search magic face  to find more of our works.Supported DevicesT2-Iron supports all Android Wear smartwatches, Moto 360, Huawei Watch, LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, TAG Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, Sony Smartwatch3 & Asus ZenWatch.About UsWe are a small Chinese team dedicated descriptionHTML:
Features
-8 unique background images
-9 marker styles
-8 function indicators: Compass, steps, week , seconds, moon phase, weather, phone battery, watch battery.
- Centigrade or Fahrenheit
-Step goals from 1,000 to 20,000

This watch face has interactive functions, select two features (Step & Weather)as indicators on your phone side first, and tap each separately on your watch.

Interactive function-Steps
1:New clear, uncluttered designed personal step-info center.
2:Weekly step curve tell how much you have done in past 6 days with current step and distance info .
3:Curve color could be changed daily from low red to high green which depends on if your actual steps reach to the goal or not.
4:Swipe down the page to check your whole activity history.

Interactive function-Weather
1:Current Weather info page with details of coming days
2:Swipe down the page to get Weather forecast for 16 days !


More Faces
If you like this interactive Face T2-Iron, share it with your friends.
Feel free to try our new watch face platform Magic Watchface, all the winners’ original watch faces will be here:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.magicwatchface.platform
You can also search magic face to find more of our works.

Supported Devices
T2-Iron supports all Android Wear smartwatches, Moto 360, Huawei Watch, LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, TAG Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, Sony Smartwatch3 & Asus ZenWatch.

About Us
We are a small Chinese team dedicated in creating original watch faces.
We are the exclusive watch face partner of Tencent, China’s NO.1 internet company.
We also have a close relationship with Mobvoi, the Chinese AI company invested by Google.

Contact Us
If you have any questions or concerns about Magic Watchface please email us:
